snippet: Marcus A. Wellons, convicted in the 1989 rape and murder of a teenage girl, was the first inmate put to death in the United States since a botched execution in Oklahoma seven weeks ago.
abstract: Georgia inmate Marcus A Wellons is executed, becoming the first inmate put to death in the United States since a botched execution in Oklahoma prompted renewed questions about capital punishment.
lead_paragraph: Marcus A. Wellons, convicted in the 1989 rape and murder of a teenage girl, was the first inmate put to death in the United States since a botched execution in Oklahoma seven weeks ago.

headline.main: Georgia Inmate Is Put to Death in First U.S. Execution Since Botched Procedure
headline.print_headline: Georgia Inmate Is Put to Death in First U.S. Execution Since Botched Procedure
